title: Metro: Last Light (2013) PC [RUS/ENG]
description:
Metro: Last Light (2013) PC [RUS/ENG]


Information:
Release date : May 14, 2013 
Genre: Action / 3D / 1st Person
Developer: 4A Games
Publisher: Deep Silver
Platform: PC
Publication Type: License [Steam Preload]
Language: Russian (RUS) / English (ENG) 
Sound language: Russian (RUS)
Tablet: Is present [ RELOADED]


Description:
In the subway tunnels beneath the ruins of post-apocalyptic Moscow remains 
of mankind reflect the deadly attack from both outside and inside.


System Requirements:
Operating system: Windows XP (SP2) / Windows Vista / Windows 7 / Windows 8
Processor: Dual Core CPU (2.2 + GHz Dual Core CPU or better)
RAM: 2 GB RAM
Free space on HDD: 8 Gb
Video: DirectX 9, Shader Model 3 compliant graphics cards (GeForce 8800 GT 512 MB) 


Installation Steps:
Turn off your Antivirus
For Win 7 / 8 Run as administrator (click right mouse button on main file and select run as admin)

1) Download the torrent.
2) Run setup.exe and install the game
3) Play
